---
title: Submit Signed Transfer Transaction for Broadcast
slug: /guides/staking-api/near/transfer/submit-signed-transfer-transaction
---

After signing the transaction, send a `PUT` request to `/api/v1/flows/[:flow_id]/next` with the signed payload. The Staking API will broadcast the transaction to the NEAR network.

### Parameters

- `name` &mdash; `string` Name of the action to execute (required).
- `inputs` &mdash; `object`
  - `transaction_payload` &mdash; Signed transaction payload from the previous step's response.

#### Sample cURL Request

```bash {5-8}
curl -X PUT 'https://near-slate.datahub.figment.io/api/v1/flows/79d4a437-e964-4f90-ba19-998d0de8c1cb/next' \
-H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
-H 'Authorization: <api_key>' \
-d '{
  "name": "sign_transfer_tx",
  "inputs": {
    "transaction_payload": ""
  }
}'
```

### Response

With the signed transaction provided, the Staking API will broadcast it to the network. As the transaction progresses towards confirmation, the returned state will be either:

- `transfer_tx_broadcasting` &mdash; Transaction has been broadcast and is waiting confirmation.
- `transferred` &mdash; Transaction has been confirmed and the transfer is complete.

#### Sample Response

```json {3}
{
  "id": "79d4a437-e964-4f90-ba19-998d0de8c1cb",
  "state": "transfer_tx_broadcasting",
  "actions": [
    {
      "name": "wait",
      "estimated_state_change_at": "2023-02-27T18:45:13.315Z",
      "inputs": []
    }
  ],
  "data": {
    "from_account_pubkey": "ed25519:NUbTcj78nHFFm1J8a1GFjenAnCKV32ZdBeeqem8oyLV",
    "from_account_address": "0b81cc09294fc074814ad0de50f31644e5669f856105399b.testnet",
    "to_account_address": "slate-demo.testnet",
    "amount": "50.0",
    "transfer_transaction": {
      "raw": "",
      "signing_payload": "87050c63e63a1269228176a458743c99d23ca12ad9c9758a42c10e56799dc8c3",
      "signed": "",
      "hash": "A64WEYru3xv7jQsCDn9JV4RYK4frvNWtfAUUMYQmcVLn",
      "status": null,
      "error": null,
      "signatures": []
    }
  },
  "network_code": "near",
  "chain_code": "testnet",
  "created_at": "2023-02-27T18:35:44.613Z",
  "updated_at": "2023-02-27T18:44:12.803Z"
}
```
